resources.string: The base drop speed of the blocks. \n Units: Lines/Frame \n From 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.05)

The frame rate of the game.
 Note: A faster frame rate increases the base drop speed of the blocks.
 Units: Frames/Second 
 From 1 to 60 (Default: 30)
The sensitivity threshold of the flick gestures. \n Units: Velocity of Swipe (Pixels/Detection Cycle) \n From 1 to Infinity (Default: 30)
The delay before a block locks in place. \n Units: Milliseconds \n From 0 to Infinity (Default: 1000)
The drop speed of the block while soft dropping. \n Units: Lines/Frame \n From 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.45)
The length needed to drag before the "drag gesture" is recognized. \n Units: Pixels\n From 0 to Infinity (Default: 60)
The starting time of Time Attack. \n Units: Seconds \n From 0 to Infinity (Default: 120)

Controls:
 	 Move Left/Right: Drag Left/Right 
 	 Hard Drop: Swipe Down 
 	 Soft Drop: Drag Down 
 	 Hold Block: Swipe Up

Scoring:
 	 Base Points: 
 		 Single: 100 
 		 Double: 300 
 		 Triple: 500 
 		 Tetris: 800 
 	 Base T-Spin Points: 
 		 No Clear, Kicked: 100 
 		 No Clear, Not Kicked: 400 
 		 Single, Kicked: 200 
 		 Single, Not Kicked: 800 
 		 Double: 1200 
 		 Triple: 1600 
 	 Back to Back Tetris/T-spin: Base Points * 1.5 
 	 Chaining: 50 * Chain #
